itunes:title: In Praise of Bookstagrammers
title: In Praise of Bookstagrammers
description: In the regular Books with Hooks segment, author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with P.S. Literary agents extraordinaire, Carly Watters and CeCe Lyra about query letters and opening pages that listeners have submitted.  After which, Bianca interviews Traci Thomas, Bookstagrammer and host of the wildly popular podcast, The Stacks,  about the value of Bookstagrammers, the influence of social media, and fighting for the the community who champions authors.
content:encoded: In the regular Books with Hooks segment, author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with P.S. Literary agents extraordinaire, Carly Watters and CeCe Lyra about query letters and opening pages that listeners have submitted.  After which, Bianca interviews Traci Thomas, Bookstagrammer and host of the wildly popular podcast, The Stacks,  about the value of Bookstagrammers, the influence of social media, and fighting for the the community who champions authors.
itunes:author: Bianca Marais, Carly Watters, Cecilia Lyra and Traci Thomas
itunes:keywords: Bianca Marais, Carly Watters, Cecilia Lyra, PS Literary Agency, Traci Thomas, The Stacks, Books with Hooks, publishing, writing advice, query letters, Bookstagram
